name: Tumblr Block "More Blogs"
description: No Tumblr. Seriously, you're getting annoying.

user.name: Mike Gebirge
user.about: I'm just some tumblr user that is annoyed by tumblr's shortcomings that even I can fix in a few minutes. So here they are, a few of them. For updates, follow http://kedaiyis-fixes.tumblr.com/

obsoletion_message:
It looks like Tumblr removed this crap, at least I don't see it anymore.

If you're still seeing *this exact kind of ads* on Tumblr, please inform me.
additional_info:
Tumblr added another way to "recommended" blogs. So now it's an annoying "Some more blogs:" thing.

It even has a cute "Please no" button to remove it. But hey, Tumblr, guess what? Why don't you leave it away completely, how about that?

My mother taught me to say "No thanks", but I'm very tempted to say "No fuck you".

Dear Adblock Plus people: The rule is "tumblr.com##.recommended-unit-container" without quotes (generated by ABP Element Hiding Helper).
